column1: Injambakkam is a locality in the south of Chennai in the Indian state of Tamil Nadu. Being a part of the Walajabad block of the district
column2: its panchayat is part of Walajabad panchayat union. Injambakkam is located along the ECR.

column3: 084. Males constituted 52% of the population and females 48%. Injambakkam had an average literacy rate of 73%
column4: higher than the national average of 59.5%: male literacy was 78%
column5: and female literacy was 68%. In 2001 in Injambakkam
column6: 15% of the population was under 6 years of age.
